item0.name: Refillable Potion
item0.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

item1.name: Sorcerer's Shoes
item1.description:
18 Magic Penetration
45 Move Speed

item2.name: Amplifying Tome
item2.description: 20 Ability Power

item3.name: Banshee's Veil
item3.description:
80 Ability Power
45 Magic Resist
10 Ability Haste
  • Annul: Grants a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability (40s cooldown).

    Item cooldown is restarted if you take damage from champions before it is completed.

item5.name: Luden's Tempest
item5.description:
80 Ability Power
6 Magic Penetration
600 Mana
20 Ability Haste
  • Echo: Damaging Abilities deal an additional (100 + 10% Ability Power) magic damage to the target and 3 nearby enemies and grants you 15% Move Speed for 2 seconds (10s cooldown). Dealing ability damage to Champions reduces this item's cooldown by 0.5 second, up to 3 seconds per spell cast.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Magic Penetration.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Dark Harvest
perk0.shortDesc: Damaging a low health champion inflicts <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and harvests a soul from the victim.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging a Champion below 50% health deals adaptive damage and harvests their soul, permanently increasing Dark Harvest's damage by 5.

Dark Harvest damage: 20-60 (based on level) (+5 damage per soul) (+0.25 bonus AD) (+0.15 AP)
Cooldown: 45s (resets to 1.5s on takedown)

item0.name: Luden's Tempest
item0.description:
80 Ability Power
6 Magic Penetration
600 Mana
20 Ability Haste
  • Echo: Damaging Abilities deal an additional (100 + 10% Ability Power) magic damage to the target and 3 nearby enemies and grants you 15% Move Speed for 2 seconds (10s cooldown). Dealing ability damage to Champions reduces this item's cooldown by 0.5 second, up to 3 seconds per spell cast.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Magic Penetration.

item1.name: Fiendish Codex
item1.description:
35 Ability Power
10 Ability Haste

item3.name: Dark Seal
item3.description:
15 Ability Power
40 Health
  • Glory: Gain 2 stacks for a champion kill or 1 stacks for an assist (up to 10 stacks total). Lose 4 stacks on death.
  • Dread: Grants 5 Ability Power per stack of Glory.

    Obtained Glory stacks are preserved between this item and Mejai's Soulstealer.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

Dark Harvest damage: 20-60 (based on level) (+5 damage per soul) (+0.25 bonus AD) (+0.15 AP)
Cooldown: 45s (resets to 1.5s on takedown)

item0.name: Everfrost
item0.description:
80 Ability Power
250 Health
600 Mana
20 Ability Haste

Active - Glaciate: Deal (125+35% Ability Power) magic damage in a cone, Slowing enemies by 65% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies at the center of the cone are Rooted instead (20s).
Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 15 Ability Power.

item1.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
item1.description:
65 Ability Power
45 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active - Stasis: You become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (120s cooldown).

Cooldown: 45s (resets to 1.5s on takedown)

item0.name: Demonic Embrace
item0.description:
70 Ability Power
350 Health
  • Azakana Gaze: Dealing Ability damage burns enemies for 1.2% max Health magic damage every second for 4 seconds. You gain 10 Armor and Magic Resist if a champion is affected (+2.5 Armor and Magic Resist for each additional champion affected).

item1.name: Liandry's Anguish
item1.description:
80 Ability Power
600 Mana
20 Ability Haste
  • Agony: Deal up to 12% bonus magic damage based on the target's bonus health (maxed at 1250 bonus health).
  • Torment: Dealing damage with Abilities causes enemies to burn for (15 + 1.5% Ability Power) + 1% max Health magic damage per second for 4 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

item2.name: Mejai's Soulstealer
item2.description:
20 Ability Power
100 Health
  • Glory: Gain 4 stacks for a champion kill or 2 stacks for an assist (up to 25 stacks total). Lose 10 stacks on death.
  • Dread: Grants 5 Ability Power per stack of Glory. Gain 10% Move Speed if you have at least 10 stacks.

    Obtained Glory stacks are preserved between this item and Dark Seal.

item3.name: Banshee's Veil
item3.description:
80 Ability Power
45 Magic Resist
10 Ability Haste
  • Annul: Grants a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability (40s cooldown).

    Item cooldown is restarted if you take damage from champions before it is completed.

item5.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
item5.description:
120 Ability Power
  • Magical Opus: Increases your total Ability Power by 35%.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Dark Harvest
perk0.shortDesc: Damaging a low health champion inflicts <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and harvests a soul from the victim.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging a Champion below 50% health deals adaptive damage and harvests their soul, permanently increasing Dark Harvest's damage by 5.

Dark Harvest damage: 20-60 (based on level) (+5 damage per soul) (+0.25 bonus AD) (+0.15 AP)
Cooldown: 45s (resets to 1.5s on takedown)

item0.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
item0.description:
120 Ability Power
  • Magical Opus: Increases your total Ability Power by 35%.

item1.name: Horizon Focus
item1.description:
115 Ability Power
  • Focus Fire: Damaging a champion with a non-targeted Ability at over 700 range or Immobilizing them Reveals them and increases their damage taken from you by 10% for 6 seconds.

    The Ability that triggers Focus Fire also benefits from the damage increase. Pets and non-immobilizing traps do not trigger this effect. Only the initial placement of zone Abilities will trigger this effect.

item0.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item0.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item1.name: Refillable Potion
item1.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

item2.name: Dark Seal
item2.description:
15 Ability Power
40 Health
  • Glory: Gain 2 stacks for a champion kill or 1 stacks for an assist (up to 10 stacks total). Lose 4 stacks on death.
  • Dread: Grants 5 Ability Power per stack of Glory.

    Obtained Glory stacks are preserved between this item and Mejai's Soulstealer.

item3.name: Doran's Ring
item3.description:
15 Ability Power
70 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Siphon: Killing a minion restores 6 Mana. If you can't gain Mana, restore 3 Health instead.

item4.name: Liandry's Anguish
item4.description:
80 Ability Power
600 Mana
20 Ability Haste
  • Agony: Deal up to 12% bonus magic damage based on the target's bonus health (maxed at 1250 bonus health).
  • Torment: Dealing damage with Abilities causes enemies to burn for (15 + 1.5% Ability Power) + 1% max Health magic damage per second for 4 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Dark Harvest
perk0.shortDesc: Damaging a low health champion inflicts <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and harvests a soul from the victim.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging a Champion below 50% health deals adaptive damage and harvests their soul, permanently increasing Dark Harvest's damage by 5.

Dark Harvest damage: 20-60 (based on level) (+5 damage per soul) (+0.25 bonus AD) (+0.15 AP)
Cooldown: 45s (resets to 1.5s on takedown)

item0.name: Luden's Tempest
item0.description:
80 Ability Power
6 Magic Penetration
600 Mana
20 Ability Haste
  • Echo: Damaging Abilities deal an additional (100 + 10% Ability Power) magic damage to the target and 3 nearby enemies and grants you 15% Move Speed for 2 seconds (10s cooldown). Dealing ability damage to Champions reduces this item's cooldown by 0.5 second, up to 3 seconds per spell cast.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Magic Penetration.

item1.name: Horizon Focus
item1.description:
115 Ability Power
  • Focus Fire: Damaging a champion with a non-targeted Ability at over 700 range or Immobilizing them Reveals them and increases their damage taken from you by 10% for 6 seconds.

    The Ability that triggers Focus Fire also benefits from the damage increase. Pets and non-immobilizing traps do not trigger this effect. Only the initial placement of zone Abilities will trigger this effect.
